name: TheRobForeShow
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get the latest politics, news, and analysis with a dash of progressive perspective every Saturday, Sunday, and Monday with host Rob Fore as you get informed together.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
